38bae370c9188e36edfd757fc9ad87468cca829","license":"MIT","urls":["bzz-raw://42490ae4af781b3724facad4c43cf9a6a18a79d5f8f44e3725c9bac005fc563e","dweb:/ipfs/QmZje5r6D4s6hQ5ExTm6TuYwx1p9JFdyhEaRMua8jrTg24"]}},"version":1}

acceptOwnership().details: The new owner accepts the ownership transfer.

params._reserveBps: Initial reserve share in basis points (e.g., 1000 = 10%)
params._reserveBuffer: Address to receive reserve share of fees
params._treasury: Address to receive treasury share of fees
params._treasuryBps: Initial treasury share in basis points (e.g., 9000 = 90%)
params._vaultToken: Address of the vault shares token

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

pendingOwner().details: Returns the address of the pending owner.

releaseReserve().details: Can be called by anyone (pull payment model)

releaseTreasury().details: Can be called by anyone (pull payment model)

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._reserveBps: New reserve share in basis points
params._treasuryBps: New treasury share in basis points

transferOwnership(address).details: Starts the ownership transfer of the contract to a new account. Replaces the pending transfer if there is one. Can only be called by the current owner. Setting `newOwner` to the zero address is allowed; this can be used to cancel an initiated ownership transfer.

releasable(address).notice: Calculate releasable amount for an account

releaseReserve().notice: Release vault shares to reserve buffer

reserveBuffer().notice: Reserve buffer address (receives reserve share of fees)

reserveShareBps().notice: Reserve share percentage (in basis points, e.g., 1000 = 10%)

totalReceived().notice: Get current balance of vault tokens in this contract

treasury().notice: Treasury address (receives treasury share of fees)

treasuryShareBps().notice: Treasury share percentage (in basis points, e.g., 9000 = 90%)
